Whether you want to get the most out of your travels, spruce up your resume or simply expand your skills, learning a new language is an excellent way to level up. One of the easiest methods for doing that — and for fitting learning seamlessly into your schedule — is with a convenient language app such as Babbel. And you can get it for less with this limited-time Babbel language app deal.

For a limited time, you can secure lifetime access to Babbel for just $129.99 (regularly $599) with code LEARN40 from Cult of Mac Deals. Don’t miss your chance to master multiple languages for one low price!

Learn a new language in as little as a month

Learning multiple languages becomes much easier with the right language app. Touting more than 10 million users worldwide, Babbel is the No. 1 top-grossing language app worldwide. And for a one-time price, you’ll get a lifetime of language learning.

That gives you unlimited access to more than 10,000 hours of high-quality language lessons — forever. This deal covers all 14 of Babbel’s language courses. The full lineup includes: Danish, Dutch, English, French, German, Indonesian, Italian, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish and Turkish.

When we say high-quality, we mean it. The app delivers simple, bite-size lessons developed by expert linguists to help you understand and speak your new language quickly and confidently. That means you won’t need to set aside hours at a time to brush up on your language skills.

Along the way, Babbel will use its speech-recognition tech to analyze your pronunciation and provide feedback, ensuring you’ll develop proper speaking habits.

A highly rate language learning app

Babbel comes exceptionally highly rated by users, with 4.7 out of 5 stars on the App Store after nearly 600,000 reviews. On Google Play, it stands at 4.6 out of 5 stars (after nearly 1 million reviews).

The language app earned rave reviews from critics, too, along with a host of industry awards. That includes features in The Wall Street Journal, Forbes, CNN and CNET and being named Fast Company’s “most innovative company in education.” As the experts at PCMag sum up, “Babbel exceeds expectations, delivering high-quality, self-paced courses.”

Save on a lifetime subscription for less with Babbel language app deal
